unit: Unit 4 | Probability, Random Variables, and Probability Distributions
title: School A Given School B
question_text: Suppose Sophia applied to $2$ different medical schools, school A and school B. Sophia has determined that she has a $40\%$ chance of getting into school A, a $55\%$ chance of getting into school B, and a $25\%$ chance of getting into both schools. What is the probability she gets into school A given that she gets into school B?
